title: Landing
intro: Welcome to my personal site! Here you can find a little about me, my work, my personality, and a way to get in contact.

sections.heading: Jesse Felix
sections.details: I’m a Web Developer located in Los Angeles, California. I have a passion for crafting cool digital experiences. I'm planning on making things happen! Maybe with you?

sections.heading: About Me
details: I obtained a Bachelor's degree in Business Finance. While exploring my inherent passion for computers, I wanted to allow myself to be more creative. I discovered Frontend Web Development and design. This became something I fully immersed myself into and want to expand by continuing to learn and explore.

Currently under the mentorship of Perpetual Education, exploring my skills by experimenting in a wide range of coding and design disciplines. I see myself continuing to challenge myself, to learn, and to do amazing things.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.intro: Lets talk about code? Maybe some life discussion? Or some of the latest music out?
